description: Complete the final 4 user stories for production readiness: Unit Tests, E2E Tests, Performance Optimization, and Documentation.

userStories.title: Unit Tests (70% Coverage)
userStories.description: Add comprehensive unit tests to achieve 70%+ code coverage. Focus on: Redux slices, hooks, utility functions, and component logic.
acceptanceCriteria: Install vitest and @testing-library/react if not present
Create tests for all Redux slices (store/slices/*.ts)
Create tests for all custom hooks (hooks/*.ts)
Create tests for utility functions (utils/*.ts)
Create tests for key components (pages, components)
Achieve 70%+ overall code coverage
All tests pass with pnpm test

userStories.title: E2E Tests (Happy Path)
userStories.description: Create Playwright E2E tests covering the main user flows: phone lookup, new client registration, service selection, technician selection, and check-in confirmation.
acceptanceCriteria: Install Playwright if not present
Create E2E test for returning client flow (phone lookup -> services -> technician -> confirm)
Create E2E test for new client flow (registration -> services -> technician -> confirm)
Create E2E test for guest check-in flow
All E2E tests pass
userStories.notes: Created 29 E2E tests across 3 spec files covering home navigation, client check-in flow, and staff clock-in flow. All tests pass.

userStories.title: Performance Optimization
userStories.description: Optimize the app for production: lazy loading, code splitting, bundle analysis, and performance improvements.
acceptanceCriteria: Implement React.lazy for route-based code splitting
Add Suspense boundaries with loading states
Optimize images and assets
Ensure bundle size is under 500KB gzipped
Add performance monitoring hooks if needed
Build succeeds with optimizations

userStories.title: Final Code Review & Documentation
userStories.description: Complete code review, fix any issues, and create production documentation including README, CHANGELOG, and deployment guide.
acceptanceCriteria: Run linter and fix all warnings/errors
Ensure all TypeScript strict mode passes
Create/update README.md with setup and usage instructions
Create CHANGELOG.md documenting all features
Create docs/DEPLOYMENT.md with deployment instructions
Verify all features work in production build
Output <promise>COMPLETE</promise> when done

globalContext.techStack: React 18 + TypeScript + Vite + Tailwind CSS + Redux Toolkit
